alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 11:31PM CDT until May 22 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Marion County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woodlawn, or 11 miles north of Marshall, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Vivian, Blanchard, Jefferson, Oil City, Mooringsport, Hosston, Belcher, Gilliam, Karnack, Woodlawn, Smithland, Berea, Gray, Uncertain, Nesbitt, Caddo Lake, Leigh and Bethany. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
